remarks: Restriction of a product metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ressprdsds.y $e |- ( ph -> Y = ( S Xs_ ( x e. I |-> R ) ) ) $.
ressprdsds.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( T Xs_ ( x e. I |-> ( R |`s A ) ) ) ) $.
ressprdsds.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
ressprdsds.d $e |- D = ( dist ` Y ) $.
ressprdsds.e $e |- E = ( dist ` H ) $.
ressprdsds.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. U ) $.
ressprdsds.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
ressprdsds.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
ressprdsds.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> R e. X ) $.
ressprdsds.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> A e. Z ) $.
ressprdsds $p |- ( ph -> E = ( D |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
$d I x $.
$d ph x $.
